eventsFunctions.description: Create a bag to store items in
eventsFunctions.name: CreateBag
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create a bag called _PARAM1_ to store items in with _PARAM2_ slots.

parameters.description: Max number of slots (-1 for infinite)
parameters.name: maxSlot

eventsFunctions.description: Create item that can be used for items :)
eventsFunctions.name: CreateItem
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create an item _PARAM1_ with the max slot item quantity of _PARAM2_.

parameters.description: Name of the item (Must not be "" or "0" as they are considered as empty)
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Max number of items in one slot (-1 for infinite)
parameters.name: maxItem

eventsFunctions.description: Replace two slots in two bags
eventsFunctions.name: ReplaceSlots
eventsFunctions.sentence: Replace slot _PARAM2_ of bag _PARAM1_ with slot _PARAM4_ of bag _PARAM3_. (Try adding: _PARAM5_)

parameters.description: Try adding the first slot to the second slot if it can be done
parameters.name: add

eventsFunctions.description: Remove an item from an bag
eventsFunctions.name: RemoveItem
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remove _PARAM3_ _PARAM1_ items from bag _PARAM2_ in slot _PARAM4_. (Ignore item name: _PARAM5_)

events.name: Remove items from a slot in the bag
Remove items from the bag automatically

parameters.description: Number of items to be removed
parameters.name: quantity

parameters.description: Ignore the name of the object while removing items
parameters.name: ignoreName

eventsFunctions.description: Add an item to an bag
eventsFunctions.name: AddItem
eventsFunctions.sentence: Add _PARAM3_ _PARAM1_ items to bag _PARAM2_ in slot _PARAM4_. (Extra bag: _PARAM5_)

events.name: Add items to a slot in the bag
Add items to the bag automatically
Add items to the extra bag if needed

parameters.description: Name of an extra bag (will be created if it doesn't exist)
parameters.longDescription: A bag to store all the items that couldn't be added to the specified bag
parameters.name: extraBag

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a slot is empty in a bag
eventsFunctions.name: IsSlotEmpty
eventsFunctions.sentence: Check if slot _PARAM1_ is empty in bag _PARAM2_.

eventsFunctions.description: Get the quantity of an item in a slot
eventsFunctions.name: ItemQuantity

eventsFunctions.description: Get the name of an item in a slot
eventsFunctions.name: ItemName
